title: Hardik and Natasha
subtitle: Jaisalmer
description: They've been labeled as high school sweethearts, best friends, and soulmates, but these words hardly capture the essence of their connection. To them, their love is akin to that of twin flames, two halves of the same soul, destined to be together.

title: Virat and Anushka
subtitle: Udaipur
description: Starkly opposite as people, their lives traversed paths they’d never imagined and one evening as they bumped into each other at a night club in Mumbai, the floor lit up to their sparkling chemistry as they gradually found a formidable home in each other.

title: Nikita and Philippe
subtitle: Pune
description: Nikita and Philippe's love story is truly inspiring, a testament to the power of connection and commitment. Their journey from university classmates to partners who thrived despite the challenges of long-distance is a narrative of resilience, love, and shared exploration.

title: Rahul and Athiya
subtitle: Dubai
description: The quaint Swiss town of Montreux plays host to folks from London and Dubai and guests from all across the globe as they all come together to celebrate this grand Sindhi-Punjabi wedding where a shy couple revels in the basking glory of love, life, and laughter.

title: TWIN FLAMES
subtitle: Bianca & Dev, Jaisalmer
description: They've been labeled as high school sweethearts, best friends, and soulmates, but these words hardly capture the essence of their connection. To them, their love is akin to that of twin flames, two halves of the same soul, destined to be together.

title: LOVE IN BLACK & WHITE
subtitle: Natasa & Hardik, Udaipur
